mapper.insert: insert into tum_notice values('NO' || LPAD(tum_notice_sequ.nextval, 5, 0), #{notice_title}, #{notice_content:VARCHAR}, #{notice_category}, sysdate, #{notice_event_start}, #{notice_event_end})
mapper.select: select count(*) from tum_notice where notice_category='공지사항'
select count(*) from tum_notice where notice_category='이벤트'

select * from(select notice_id, notice_title, notice_content, notice_reg_date, notice_category, to_char(notice_event_start,'yyyy-mm-dd') notice_event_start , to_char(notice_event_end,'yyyy-mm-dd') notice_event_end ,LEAD(notice_category,1,'noData') OVER(ORDER BY notice_id desc) next_category, LAG(notice_category,1,'noData.') OVER(ORDER BY notice_id desc) prev_category ,LEAD(notice_title,1,'noData') OVER(ORDER BY notice_id desc) next_title, LAG(notice_title,1,'noData.') OVER(ORDER BY notice_id desc) prev_title ,LEAD(notice_id,1,'noData') OVER(ORDER BY notice_id desc) next_id, LAG(notice_id,1,'noData') OVER(ORDER BY notice_id desc) prev_id from tum_notice) where notice_id=#{notice_id}
mapper.update: update tum_notice set notice_title=#{notice_title}, notice_content=#{notice_content}, notice_category=#{notice_category}, notice_event_start=#{notice_event_start}, notice_event_end=#{notice_event_end} where notice_id=#{notice_id}
